title: Week 5 Recap: Bills Beat the Chiefs, Green Bay’s Crazy OT Win Over Cincinnati, and Lance and the 49ers Fall to the Cardinals
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by Benjamin Solak, and they begin by discussing the Buffalo Bills’ statement win on the road over the Kansas City Chiefs (2:45). Then they discuss the Packers’ wild overtime win over the Bengals, Detroit’s heartbreaking loss to Minnesota, and much more (26:40). Then Kevin and Nora are joined by Steven Ruiz, and they go through Trey Lance’s first start in a loss to the still undefeated Arizona Cardinals (1:19:12). Lastly, Kevin and Nora answer a listener question (1:28:30).

Host: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guests: Benjamin Solak and Steven Ruiz
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
